entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:12 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -41.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 03:40 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Ice fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 38. Wind chill near minus 58. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 43 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 43 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 53 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 53 in the morning and minus 48 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
